body.p:
Hawesville, Hancock Co Ky
January 30th 1865-
Govenner --

I want ask you please send me 50 new muskets, and 20 postials We want a home guard company in guarding the place, country We want union guards, and make rebels that We said for the protection of union citizens, and towns in our state We want to go to hunt and look for the rebels
I ask you please send me a large union flag why we must take it will thieves for the property They will conscript. We want said must it
if you can send me eight hundred minies. balls. catrige.

I am your firend.
Charles Richey Capt
Hawesville Ky-

Hancock
Hawesville Ky
Jany 30" 1865
Richey charles
Capt --
To The Gov.
says they intend forming a Home Guard Co. send 50 muskets, 20 pistols, and a large Union flag --

L. B. No 9, 1865 P 476
Recd A. G. O. Ky 9 Feby 1865
